name: Advance Auto Parts, Inc.
description: Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is a leading automotive aftermarket parts provider in North America. Founded in 1932 and headquartered in Raleigh, North Carolina, the company serves both professional installers and do-it-yourself customers. Advance Auto Parts operates through a vast network of over 4,800 stores and numerous distribution centers, providing a wide range of automotive parts, accessories, and maintenance items. The company prides itself on delivering quality products from trusted brands, including AC Delco, Delphi, and Carquest. Additionally, Advance Auto Parts offers various services such as battery testing and installation, oil recycling, and engine diagnostic services, ensuring customers have access to comprehensive automotive solutions. With a strong commitment to customer service and a focus on innovation, the company continues to enhance its digital presence, providing online shopping options and mobile applications for easier access to products and services. Advance Auto Parts aims to empower customers to take control of their vehicle maintenance and repair needs, contributing to a safer and more efficient driving experience.

seo.meta_title: Advance Auto Parts, Inc. | Quality Automotive Parts & Accessories
seo.meta_description: Advance Auto Parts, Inc. is your trusted source for automotive aftermarket parts and accessories. Explore our wide range of products and services for all your vehicle needs.

faq.answer: Tom Greco is the CEO of Advance Auto Parts, Inc.
